name: Fuel Grab
description:
You're in a strange place and desperately low on fuel.

How long can you survive?

A top-down classic-inspired rogue-lite twitch arcade game that will put your skills to the test.

Race against time as you collect fuel to stay alive. If you run out of fuel, you explode.
Unstable red fuel cubes rain down on you and turn into stable blue fuel cubes after some time.
Collecting red cubes lowers your fuel level. Avoid them at all costs.
Collect Bonus Cubes for points and upgrades!
Collect Coins to buy permanent upgrades.
The game is very much in 'early access' and will be updated periodically.
